dct_title_s: Sketch of General Grants position on Long Island
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows the Battle of Long Island, August 27, 1776.
"To front page 195 Vo. 1." in upper right.
Detached from Stedman, Charles. The History of the origin, progress, and termination of the American war (London: J. Murray [etc.], 1794) plate 2.
